channel.title: Tram needs to through solid ground
channel.description:
Hi,
Found a little 'bug', I don't know if the devs gonna fix this...
![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
So the tram grips around the bar, but at this point, the 'arm' of the arm goes through the solid ground (metal bridge)
Maybe, change it in a bridge sliding together when tram has passed....

item.title: Tram needs to through solid ground
item.dc:creator: Dragunov2
item.description:
Well replayed the mod several times now and the more u play it, the more u notice of course…

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Tram needs to through solid ground
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
TehBoxNoob:

I don’t really think its a problem.I mean you don’t get to see it from the tram anyway.

Pretty much, or even seeing it for that long to make it worth making any adjustments to the map.
